website_summaries.verdict: The two-piece design provides space-saving flexibility.
pros: Some customers purchased multiple tables for a variety of configurations
This beautiful set can even be wall mounted for a floating look
Combined pieces measure 47.25 inches wide by 15.25 inches deep by 22 inches high
cons: Can be shaky when holding significant weight

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved into a 500 square foot condo and need flexible storage that utilizes every square inch. I also wanted the storage to be attractive. I finally settled on 3 sets of these shelves. I'm experimenting with different configurations, the attached photo is my favorite so far. (3 sets together). Bonus: when I move, I can put them in a different arrangement as needed. A friend helped me to put these together. The first set took about 35 min. By the time we got to the 3rd set, we got them together in 20 min. They are simple enough that one person could put them together.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble finding shelves to work around an inconveniently placed floor vent.. so I bought two sets of these shelves and stacked them together to work around it. I am very happy with my purchase and the versatility of these shelves. They were easy to assemble and are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping and everything looked beautiful I absolutely love it in my living room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of work but worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So my husband and I were a bit apprehensive about mounting this on the wall, but I loved seeing the previous photos of it in the reviews. We have two bulldogs that constantly shed and I wanted something very modern but functional for our lifestyle (vacuuming everyday). We went to Home Depot purchased the brackets to mount it, and my husband went to work building it! From previous reviews, I wouldn't use the wood glue because you might get confused putting the unit together, so best advice is to just wait on the glue. Good luck! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Marie

customer_reviews.title: It's great choice for my home
customer_reviews.text: It's great choice for my home!!! It's book shelf but you can use as a TV stand. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: mirza saad baig

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but moves around a bit.
customer_reviews.text: The product came undamaged, but it was very heavy and you will need a second person to lift the box. The instructions were perfect and the pieces were all clearly marked. The only reason I did not give it 5 Stars is that since the pieces are independent of each other and the finish is so smooth, they slide around a bit when they are in the horizontal position. I'm sure a small piece of rubber would stop this and might be a good idea to include in the packaging. They do include straps to drill into the wall in order to avoid "tipping", but that was not an option as my piece is away from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: The Shizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great stand with easy instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this was beyond my expectations. It is built very well and not thin wood as many of these boxed sets are. The instructions were also a pleasant surprise. It comes with everything you need to ensure that the stand will remain sturdy for a long time including wood glue. You will need a Phillips screwdriver, but would recommend a still for easiest install time. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Pros 1. Easy setup - comes with all the tools you need so don't worry about having your own 2. Perfect size! I live in a 900ft apartment and this fits perfectly in the living room with lots of space left over 3. Design is awesome! I'm using it with the longest style - the asymmetrical style 4. Package is a little heavy, you may need another person to life but I just had to push it so I was fine - easy to push it 5. I'm holding a 55 inch TV on it and it's doing well + looks very good No complaints - seems good quality! Sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed. Great instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile purchase. It’s a double set for arrangement however you’d like. Look at user photos for examples. I appreciated the instructions, which were easy to follow and easy to assemble. The packaging was also protective. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: WAM

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and very functional
customer_reviews.text: We were wall mounting a new tv and needed something quick and inexpensive to use for our tv components. This worked great. You can easily adjust them to configure many ways. It's not your typical 3/4" melamine shelves. They are thick and look good. Was concerned about the unit getting damaged in shipping, but it was packed very well and had no defects at all. Installation instructions were easy to follow and took about 30 min to assemble them both.
customer_reviews.author: Jef

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY THIS MONTH
customer_reviews.text: It has sturdy wood and I could put it together by myself in lesson then an hour. I was most worried about that as a single mom who just moved to a new city. Didn't need any help and I love how I can customize it to suit our needs. Will buy it again in the near future
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: Versitile
customer_reviews.text: We had been looking for months for something to house the tv and electronics without wires showing and not look like a gigantic mess. Did not want to spend a couple thousand dollars and did not want a big bulky heavy unit either. We purchased this and two of the companion bookcases and created our own. This is very versitile, we were surprised and pleased with the quality of the unit and actually had fun deciding on our design. It not only housed tv and electronics but pictures, collections and dvds and some books, all neat and clean. No hideous mess. Had it for two months and and it is easy to clean and a joy to look at.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Here is a pic we just put it together, we don't have it accessorized. Took us less than an hour, my daughter and I. It's a space saver and looks even than the picture. I like that we can change the configuration of it later if we want to.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie'shouse

customer_reviews.title: solid construction, easy to set up, versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid and well made piece (actually 2 pieces) that can be configured in multiple ways. I keep my 55" tv on top, stuff underneath and on the internal spaces. I'm happy with it -- it has performed well
customer_reviews.author: Rimantas Blekaitis

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for the easy-to-read instructions!
customer_reviews.text: These bookshelves are great. They aren't flimsy like I was concerned they might be. But what motivated me to immediately write this review is how EASY the assembly instructions were to follow. Thank you, Coaster, for making it so simple to assemble these shelves. The parts were all easy to identify, the instructions were written in plain English with clear pictures, and assembly was very intuitive. It took my husband and I (and we are NOT generally handy people) about 45 minutes to assemble both shelves. We spent more time trying all the different configuration options to decide which one looked best in our room than we did putting the shelves together. I'm extremely pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: Pleased Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Simple, functional and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a tv stand.. for both TVs! Now we can game side by side ;) And the cubbies are perfect for two consoles. I’m a fan! Wouldn’t mind buying another to make it even longer and spread the TVs out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Scott

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE BOOK CASES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had recently bought some bookshelves from a large retailer which was assembled the same way as these. They were horrible to assemble and not very sturdy. I was so leery when I opened the box and discovered these were assembled the same way. But when I began to work with them they went together so much easier! Everything is well marked, all the parts were there and they look so much more expensive than they are. The case is a nice white and they look like a piece of furniture purchased in a furniture store.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S Tappan

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. Wasn't hard to put together. (my BF did it though) posted it on FB, everyone agreed it's super cool looking. Also, when I got it, the box had a huge hole in it and when I opened it, that same board had one too. I did the return thing and they shipped me another one at no additional cost. The shipping was even free. Great service. So looks great. But I'm giving four stars instead of 5 because there is this scratch on it. It's small, but still.
customer_reviews.author: SGJG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece for an affordable price! It's so versatile in the way it can be set up. Installation was super easy. The package came without any damage. We use it as our TV cabinet and our living room looks very nice with it. If we move in the future, it can be a book case too. This is one of the two best furniture piece I have ever bought online. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Well put together and you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were kind of vague but if you have a brain, you can put it together. It really looks nice as a TV stand in my living space. It's not the nicest but it isn't the crappiest I've ever seen. The packaging was a hassle because it's a long/large/heavy cardboard box and I have to wait for recycling day at the end of the month. I dig it, it really puts my living room together.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Expect more with this price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept for tv stand. But with this price, I expect the corner angles should be handled more carefully. We have toddler at home and the edges are not round enough, so we have to tape them.
customer_reviews.author: winnie

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase/TV stand is a perfect addition to my open living room. I chose the white color and it really brightens up the place. I love the fact that it is easy to put together, and can be changed according to my mood. It's great to display books and other decors, and it functions perfectly as a TV stand. I'm really glad to have found this on Amazon and get it with free shipping. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mia Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Infinite possibilities!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We needed something to store our boardgames and I wanted something low enough that it wouldn't block our windows. I love that you can set it up in various positions. It was super easy to put together, it took 45 minutes at a leisurely pace. Couldn't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: C. Day

customer_reviews.title: I really love this piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I really love this piece of furniture! It arrived on time, was easy to assemble, and looks great. It's solid wood, and as others have said, it really looks like an expensive piece of furniture, and I've received many compliments on it. It's adjustable even after it's assembled, which is a great feature it you need a little more space or a little less. I've am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MsMac

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price we paid and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My daughter needed a tv stand in her room and what we ordered is perfect. There are many ways to can stand this up, it's pretty and flexible in design. It's exactly what she needed.
customer_reviews.author: Olgie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So easy to assemble and it's looks exactly like the pictures. So many options of how you can arrange the pieces for a different look too. I really recommend using a drill, you'll do less damage to the piece and it will take you no time to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is good. Package is good
customer_reviews.text: It was not quite stable when shake it. Overall it is good. Package is good. No damage at all. Took me one hour and a half to assemble. The surface is really slippery. Had to use the film that came with it in order to prevent it from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jiawei ren

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, I did myself and only took about 45 mins. It looks just like the photo and gave the look I was going for in my living room
customer_reviews.author: K Starz

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I paid, like, $80 for a pair of these. A year later, still in perfect condition and completely sturdy despite having about 120 lbs of stuff on them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Trohoski

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and very sturdy. Assembly is not that bad. I added bumpers to the bottom of it so it won’t scratch it self nor the floor. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Simple but enough
customer_reviews.text: I have seen this in modern stores for 3x the price. This isn't quite the look I was going for to me it's more of an ikea type look, meaning kind of on the lower end of modern furniture but if you dress it up right this can look like a higher end piece.. with the right accessories. Another option is to add a high gloss white coat. Pros... very easy to assemble. I assembled it myself with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: A_diva

customer_reviews.title: ... I was intimidated by the instructions even though they're super simple I just didn't recognize the type of screws ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was intimidated by the instructions even though they're super simple I just didn't recognize the type of screws but all you need is a screwdriver to put this thing together. It was very easy once I got started and I'm very happy with how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, very easy to put together. Only downfall is it’s essentially 2 pieces that sit on top of one another, so the top half slides around.
customer_reviews.author: Dngaston

customer_reviews.title: it should be pretty versatile. However
customer_reviews.text: I had such high expectation of this product, since it can be used in different ways -- on its head, on its side; it should be pretty versatile. However, it turns out that it doesn't hold up well; It certainly cannot be used as a TV stand. It's pretty shaky. I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: siamak javadi

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment Center
customer_reviews.text: Oh, this is one lovely piece of furniture. Easy to assemble and contours into many different designs to fit the house or space. It opens up my living room and looks so fresh and modern. I'm so happy I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Flynn

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product in white. Very heavy in the box and lots of packaging. Asked my boyfriend to put it together and it took him about an hour but it looks so gorgeous with all the books, dvds, and picture frames. Much better than the last tv stand I had! It's just really fun and I recommend this for anybody looking to jazz up the living room. Quite sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: GoldiKo

customer_reviews.title: Love this shelf!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this shelf! I'm pretty picky and don't give 5 stars often but this one deserves it IMO. Shelves are thick yet light. But they hold up my 50" tv without a budge. They're beautiful and adjustable and can be set up in several different configurations. What else can one ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: It will work fine but safety issues I attached the two pieces with ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it was two separate pieces. It will work fine but safety issues I attached the two pieces with a metal bar and screws. Looks good and TV fits on it well.
customer_reviews.author: dickiedo

customer_reviews.title: love this console
customer_reviews.text: There are visible gaps between the pieces -- but very functional and nice looking otherwise. Aseembly was ok
customer_reviews.author: C. Hendry

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this product, wow what a beautiful piece of furniture affordable and good looking, so easy to build, I loved the finish the plastic feel for durability, and slippery for sliding around the room, for cleaning under neath. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Just

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't wait to get this up in my living room ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait to get this up in my living room! My mom stopped by to help me put it together! Took us maybe 1hr with a toddler running around! My 21 month old daughter loves it bc it's just her height! VERY WELL PACKAGED! Would order from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: JesusLovesYou!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great- I only gave it 4 stars because it came without instructions. Amazon referred me to Coaster, who sent them once I found them online and called them.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, going to use it for my plants. Good quality and heavy construction.
customer_reviews.author: robin mignogna

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Better than i expected. It is very sturdy, was easy to put together, very modern and versatile. I would recommend this to anyone looking at!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K.

customer_reviews.title: It looks great! It was easy to put together and it ...
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this thing for the price! It looks great! It was easy to put together and it is sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: All negative points corrected
customer_reviews.text: Well packed with box edges and corners reinforced. All pieces inside the box protected with styropor and plastic covers. Easy to assemble. Looks like all the negative points in other reviews are now corrected. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Hector C. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Coaster home bookcase/tv unit
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit!( I sit and admire it!)good quality product. Son in law put it together with no problem! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: I Like!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It was easy to put together. And, I like that I can use it in various ways. It's not the best of wood. But, who cares. You get what you pay for. It serves its purpose and it adds a touch of modernism to my family room.
customer_reviews.author: Gilmo676

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble it
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to assemble this set. I did it all by myself and the material is not heavy at all. I bought it @$99 and now it dropped to $82, which is the only thing upset me. Lol ~ Oh, it fits my 55" TV perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Luna & Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility. Looks good and appears to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita R Jones

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and love it as an entertainment center. One piece was cracked though but I just turned it upside down.
customer_reviews.author: lori campbell

customer_reviews.title: I just loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I just loved this product. I bought 2 thinking it was smaller however as it is modular and has the flexibility to organize it the way we want, I kept both, one for the leaving room and another one for the bedroom I recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Nussbaumer

customer_reviews.title: Love this unit
customer_reviews.text: Neat shelves, you can put it up in different ways - hint - do use glue (included in the package) for all wooden surfaces during assembly, makes it more stable. Love this unit, but the price is now 20$ less than when I bought it... So 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well packed and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks very nice after it is completed and it is so versatile! Absolutley love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy. Had to be careful not to place heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy. Had to be careful not to place heavy items on it. I've bought two other larger shelves and those were well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COOL AND MODERN!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this as a tv stand and eventually repurposed it as a shoe display for my boyfriend. It worked great for both. Very sturdy and easy to clean. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: The two components when came were of different sizes. They do not fit perfectly. I had to put a wooden bar below to get them aligned properly. Once of the bar is visibly skewed spoiling whole beauty of the setup. Disappointing. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Love this furniture
customer_reviews.text: Love this entertainment center. Easy to put together and doesn't water mark easily. Looks sharp too. Would buy it again. Worth the price in my opinion. So many ways you can use it!
customer_reviews.author: Wyldmum

customer_reviews.title: Really cool modular storage
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I love the versatility of them, and they were a great price!

customer_reviews.title: I love this tv stand/bookcase will post pics soon
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv stand/bookcase will post pics soon.... love how u can re arrange so many ways when your in the mood for change. Would recommend to anyone and so easy to put together

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of assembly, but worth it for me. They are beautiful and just what I've been looking for!

customer_reviews.title: I like tis very much
customer_reviews.text: I like tis very much. It looks great in the kids bedroom/playroom. Love that it's a flexible setup. Have books, printer, planter, and a few toys on it.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's very good and nice, you can adjust it how ever you want. Everyone sees it, ask me about it. Good quality. But was little disappointed because I received it little broken, but I tried to hide it rather than return it. Because it's really heavy.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, stylish, convenient. Easy to put it together. Works and looks as in pictures. Holding a 55 inches TV with no problem.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and easy to assemble. Sturdy enough for my 50" tv.

customer_reviews.text: I really like the design. I bought it for my son's room. I put them side by side and used them for all my son's legos. Quite spacious actually! I didn't get directions with it so that was a bummer, but it was fairly easy to assemble. Looks really nice against the bright blues in the room.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

product_meta.title: Convertible TV Console and Bookcase Combination White
product_meta.description: Perfect for a variety of uses, this two-piece bookcase and TV console is fabulously versatile. It allows you to switch between various bookcase and TV stand configurations for your convenience. Bold, L-shaped shelves are arranged in striking geometric designs for a modern look. A while finish enhances its contemporary appeal. Crafted from top quality materials, this bookcase is sturdy, stylish, and smart.
feature_bullets: Set includes: One (1) TV console and bookcase combination
Materials: Engineered veneer and hollow board
